refnamediv.refpurpose: creates a BRL-CAD geometry database from C code

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.literallayout: The wdb_example program creates a BRL-CAD geometry database from C code. This database contains a sphere centered a 0,0,0, an rpp under it and a union of both objects. Note that this is for writing a database and not modifying it. Currently, there is no API for modifying the database. Also note that the values in the database are stored in millimeters.

refsect1.title: BUG REPORTS
refsect1.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>.
